channel.title: t on Merak.run
channel.description: Recent content in t on Merak.run

item.title: Testnet
item.description: A testnet is a phase of a project where a set of software nodes can help on the network to validate the conceptual ideas and practical operations. By participating in a testnet via resources (VPS servers, etc), the participants might get some tokens or cryptocurrencies in exchange, allowing them to become early investors without actually paying for the tokens.

item.title: TGE
item.description: A TGE is a Token Generation Event, moment when the token is created and contract deployed for a crypto project, usually, at that moment or shortly after it, is possible to start trading.

item.title: Token
item.description: Token is the symbol for a cryptocurrency and it’s associated with a contract to be shown on a wallet like metamask or other wallets.
